recipe.title: Cinnamon Roll Breakfast Muffins Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: In a medium bowl, mix eggs, milk, cream, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and sugar. Whisk together.
Cut each cinnamon roll into eight pieces, and stuff inside a greased muffin tin.
Pour batter in each tin about ¾ of the way. If you pour too much, the tin will overflow in the oven.
Cover the tin and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, letting the cinnamon roll absorb the mixture.
Remove the muffin from the tin, top with icing and serve warm.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a medium bowl, mix eggs, milk, cream, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and sugar.
Cut each cinnamon roll into eight pieces, and stuff inside a greased muffin tin.
Pour batter in each tin about ¾ of the way.
If you pour too much, the tin will overflow in the oven.
Cover the tin and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, letting the cinnamon roll absorb the mixture.
Remove the muffin from the tin, top with icing and serve warm.
